meanings.definition: Distended or swollen due to air or gas.
meanings.sent2: The tire was inflated properly before the long journey.
meanings.sent3: The pufferfish felt inflated after eating too much.
meanings.sent4: Her ego was as inflated as a hot air balloon.
meanings.sent5: The bouncy castle was so inflated, it felt like a cloud.

meanings.definition: Exaggerated or overblown in importance or value.
meanings.sent1: The price of the toy was inflated at the fancy store.
meanings.sent2: His achievements were often inflated by his friends.
meanings.sent3: The story about the talking dog seemed quite inflated.
meanings.sent4: Her promises were as inflated as a bubble about to burst.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map led to an inflated sense of excitement.
